name: Shadow Dancer (itch) (Grace)
description:
Hi there! Welcome to my current project: Shadow Dancer! I've developed an early level design to get a feel for the game's atmosphere and gameplay approach. In it's current state it does not represent the final product! However please feel free to leave feedback and questions! 

If you want to contact me you can find me at:

Email: gracehobsonart@gmail.com

https://twitter.com/gracehobsonart
